channel.title: Login Help (nooby)
channel.description: How can i make my server reject a client or user id.

item.title: Login Help (nooby)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

i know i have a copy of the crasher he’s using ATM but i need to make a new anti and haven’t made it. i’m workin’ on it, but am having no luck YET. for now i will deal with he can only connect once and after 3 seconds it disconnects the null so it’s not really bothering, just laggin’ my comp from all the packets. Without my server i’m usein’ 2.3gb of ram and i only have 2.5gb of ram -.-. No, i can’t shut things down cause they’re in use.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help (nooby)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:11, topic:155941”]I only used C=P until i understood how java worked i don’t use C+P anymore i’m just having problems with makin’ the data store correctly in the MySQL :S[/quote]WHEN YOU BLOCK A DOS ATTACK YOU DO NOT HAVE TO STORE ANYTHING IN THE MYSQL DATABASE. BANNING A USERNAME OR IP WILL NOT WORK.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help (nooby)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

I only used C=P until i understood how java worked i don’t use C+P anymore i’m just having problems with makin’ the data store correctly in the MySQL :S

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help (nooby)
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“itzkyle, post:9, topic:155941”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=212793.msg1859402#msg1859402 date=1193897569]

first of all my banns arnt in folder -.- i use SQL so STFU about bann him do this… i had an anti crash for my old server but i haven’t been able to add one for my SQL server yet -.-
[/quote]It doesn’t matter if you have MySQL or not. He dos’s you. Stopping a certain name or adding it to the banlist does not help, because he doesn’t actually log in. There have been many fixes posted before, why don’t you use Google or MSCP Search?

I hate google never helps… and MSCP dosn’t help very often last couple time i tried didn’t work. I rather not bother since after 3 seconds it loggs his null off, and i know he’s dos’s i have 12 mopar crashers i have used as bases to make anti’s, but i haven’t added the anti’s into my sQL since my server.java is completely different.[/quote]Why? Because you cant use C&P tutorials now? Are you depending on the Find this and add this under… guides? Well sorry, that doesn’t work out that well.

It’s easy to add, even if you have MySQL.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Help (nooby)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:8, topic:155941”][quote author=itzkyle link=topic=212793.msg1859380#msg1859380 date=1193896985]
first of all my banns arnt in folder -.- i use SQL so STFU about bann him do this… i had an anti crash for my old server but i haven’t been able to add one for my SQL server yet -.-
[/quote]It doesn’t matter if you have MySQL or not. He dos’s you. Stopping a certain name or adding it to the banlist does not help, because he doesn’t actually log in. There have been many fixes posted before, why don’t you use Google or MSCP Search?[/quote]

I hate google never helps… and MSCP dosn’t help very often last couple time i tried didn’t work. I rather not bother since after 3 seconds it loggs his null off, and i know he’s dos’s i have 12 mopar crashers i have used as bases to make anti’s, but i haven’t added the anti’s into my sQL since my server.java is completely different.

Read full topic
